work: hymn 25 to the muses and apollo

text.0:
I will begin with the Muses and Apollo and Zeus. For it is through the Muses and
 Apollo that there are singers upon the earth and players upon the lyre; but kings are from
 Zeus. Happy is he whom the Muses
text.1:
love: sweet flows speech from his lips. Hail, children of Zeus! Give honor to my
 song! And now I will remember you and another song also.

author: homeric hymns
